# Schema: `IngestionOptions`

Options controlling how ingested files are mapped to the target table schema.

- Type: `object`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `allow_missing_columns` | `boolean` | `false` | Allow columns in the table that are missing from the Parquet file. |
| `ignore_extra_columns` | `boolean` | `false` | Ignore columns in the Parquet file not present in the table. |
